xx.619537CF: Summary_Knight is blackmailing the KGB. High stakes indeed.
xx.16920759: Briefing_Apparently, Jasper Knight is demanding that his girlfriend accompanies him to the Soviet Union and he refuses to leave until he gets affirmation from his superiors in Moscow. The call will come through in the restricted, but otherwise unguarded radio room.
xx.88F692FA: Step 1_Examine note about Knight’s final demand.
xx.FFF1A26C: Step 2_Disguise yourself as the KGB officer.
xx.66F8F3D6: Step 3_Inform Jasper Knight that a call is waiting for him.
xx.11FFC340: Step 4_Escort Knight to the radio room.
xx.8140DED1: Conclusion_Good job Initiate. This should keep Knight occupied for a while.

en.619537CF: Knight is blackmailing the KGB. High stakes indeed.
en.16920759: Apparently, Jasper Knight is demanding that his girlfriend accompanies him to the Soviet Union, and he refuses to leave until he gets affirmation from his superiors in Moscow. The call will come through in the restricted, but otherwise unguarded, radio room.
en.88F692FA: Examine note about Knight’s final demand
en.FFF1A26C: Disguise yourself as the KGB Officer
en.11FFC340: Escort Jasper Knight to the radio room
en.8140DED1: Good thinking, Initiate. This should keep Knight’s attention for a while.

fr.619537CF: Knight fait chanter le KGB. Il prend de gros risques.
fr.16920759: Apparemment, Jasper Knight exige que sa petite amie puisse l'accompagner en URSS et refuse de partir avant que ses supérieurs à Moscou n'acceptent sa demande. L'appel sera reçu dans la salle radio. L'accès est limité, mais elle n'est pas surveillée.
fr.88F692FA: Examinez la note correspondant à la demande de Knight
fr.11FFC340: Escortez Jasper Knight jusqu'à la salle radio
fr.8140DED1: Bravo, Initié. Voilà qui devrait occuper Knight pendant un moment.

it.619537CF: Sembra che Knight stia ricattando il KGB. La questione si complica.
it.16920759: Jasper Knight pretende che la fidanzata lo accompagni in Unione Sovietica e si rifiuta di partire se non riceve il via libera dai superiori di Mosca. La chiamata passerà per la sala radio, che è ad accesso limitato ma priva di sorveglianza.
it.88F692FA: Esamina il messaggio con la richiesta di Knight
it.8140DED1: Bel lavoro, recluta. Questo dovrebbe tenere impegnato Knight per un po'.

de.619537CF: Knight erpresst den KGB. Der Mann spielt um hohe Einsätze.
de.16920759: Jasper Knight besteht offenbar darauf, dass ihn seine Freundin in die Sowjetunion begleitet. Er wird also erst nach einer entsprechenden Bestätigung seiner Vorgesetzten in Moskau abreisen. Entgegennehmen wird er den Anruf im abgeriegelten, aber ansonsten unbewachten Funkraum.
de.88F692FA: Lesen Sie die Notiz zu Knights letzter Forderung
de.FFF1A26C: Verkleiden Sie sich als der KGB-Offizier
de.11FFC340: Begleiten Sie Jasper Knight in den Funkraum
de.8140DED1: Gute Arbeit, Rekrut. Das dürfte Knight ein Weilchen beschäftigen.

es.619537CF: Parece que Knight está chantajeando a la KGB. Se está jugando mucho.
es.16920759: Al parecer, Jasper Knight exige que su novia lo acompañe a la Unión Soviética y se niega a partir hasta que no reciba el visto bueno de sus superiores de Moscú. La llamada se producirá en la restringida, aunque desprotegida, sala de radio.
es.88F692FA: Examina la nota que incluye la última exigencia de Knight
es.FFF1A26C: Disfrázate como el agente de la KGB
es.11FFC340: Acompaña a Knight a la sala de radio
es.8140DED1: Buen trabajo, iniciado. Con esto Knight andará ocupado un tiempo.
